issue.title: Could we get information about what is released?

content.html:
Changes are documented on the Changelog:

#!/osrf/srcsim/src/default/Changelog.md

Most tutorials have been updated, but there are a couple of new features which still need to be documented, such as the re-harness service, the new CMake variables to build only messages and services (useful for the field computer) and how to launch the 5 added finals worlds (used by CloudSim and useful for practice).
